info.name: MoonEx API
info.description: Comprehensive DeFi trading and wallet management API for the MoonEx platform

request.description: Performs a CREATE operation on email. This endpoint handles user authentication and authorization.
Performs a CREATE operation on verify. This endpoint handles user authentication and authorization.
Performs a CREATE operation on social. This endpoint handles user authentication and authorization.
Performs a CREATE operation on wallet. This endpoint handles user authentication and authorization.
Performs a CREATE operation on refresh. This endpoint handles user authentication and authorization.
Performs a CREATE operation on logout. This endpoint handles user authentication and authorization.
Performs a LIST operation on me. This endpoint handles user authentication and authorization.
Performs a CREATE operation on wallets. This endpoint manages wallet operations and transactions.
Performs a GET operation on {walletAddress}. This endpoint manages wallet operations and transactions.
Performs a GET operation on balance. This endpoint manages wallet operations and transactions.
Performs a CREATE operation on sign. This endpoint manages wallet operations and transactions.
Performs a CREATE operation on send. This endpoint manages wallet operations and transactions.
Performs a GET operation on transactions. This endpoint manages wallet operations and transactions.
Performs a CREATE operation on estimate-gas. This endpoint manages wallet operations and transactions.
Performs a CREATE operation on quote. This endpoint facilitates token swapping and trading operations.
Performs a CREATE operation on swap. This endpoint facilitates token swapping and trading operations.
Performs a CREATE operation on routes. This endpoint facilitates token swapping and trading operations.
Performs a CREATE operation on gas-estimate. This endpoint facilitates token swapping and trading operations.
Performs a CREATE operation on pools.
Performs a LIST operation on pools.
Performs a GET operation on {poolId}.
Performs a CREATE operation on add.
Performs a CREATE operation on remove.
Performs a CREATE operation on farms.
Performs a LIST operation on farms.
Performs a GET operation on {farmId}.
Performs a CREATE operation on stake.
Performs a CREATE operation on unstake.
Performs a CREATE operation on claim.
Performs a CREATE operation on proposals.
Performs a LIST operation on proposals.
Performs a GET operation on {proposalId}.
Performs a CREATE operation on vote.
Performs a GET operation on votes.
Performs a CREATE operation on orders.
Performs a LIST operation on orders.
Performs a GET operation on {orderId}.
Performs a DELETE operation on {orderId}.
Performs a GET operation on {tokenOut}.
Performs a LIST operation on resource.
